alert.note: Alert for Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 11:16AM CST until March 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Walker County in central Alabama... * Until noon CST. * At 1116 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smith Dam to near Boley Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Parrish, Sipsey, Gorgas Steam Plant, Rocky Hollow, Burnwell, Beloit, Quinton, Gorgas, Lynns Park, Goodsprings, Barney, Empire, The Wye, Powellville, Tutwiler and Boldo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CST for central and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
